SEARCH
Package edu.rpi.legup.model

Class PuzzleImporter

java.lang.Object
edu.rpi.legup.model.PuzzleImporter
Direct Known Subclasses:
BattleshipImporter, BinaryImporter, FillapixImporter, HeyawakeImporter, LightUpImporter, MasyuImporter, MinesweeperImporter, NurikabeImporter, SkyscrapersImporter, StarBattleImporter, SudokuImporter, ThermometerImporter, TreeTentImporter
public abstract class PuzzleImporter extends Object
Abstract class for importing puzzle data from various sources into a puzzle object. This class provides methods to initialize and set up a puzzle, including its board and proof structure, from different input formats such as dimensions, statements, or XML files. Subclasses must implement methods to handle specific formats for board initialization and proof creation.

    • getImporterElements

      public List<String> getImporterElements()
      Used to check that elements in the proof tree are saved properly.

      Make sure the list elements are lowercase

      Returns:
      A list of elements that will change when solving the puzzle * e.g. {"cell"}, {"cell", "line"}

    • makeTransitionChanges

      protected void makeTransitionChanges(TreeTransition transition, Node transElement) throws InvalidFileFormatException
      Updates the board state based on the changes specified in the TreeTransition.
      Parameters:
      transition - the TreeTransition object representing the transition to be updated
      transElement - the XML node containing the transition data
      Throws:
      InvalidFileFormatException - if the XML node format is incorrect or unknown nodes are encountered

    • createDefaultTree

      protected void createDefaultTree()
      Creates a default proof tree with a single root node. The root node is initialized with the current board state. The created tree is then set as the proof tree for the puzzle.
